p.span: As we draw close to the end of the 2019-20 school year, as superintendent of the East Gibson School Corporation, I want to share some of the exciting things currently happening and exciting things ahead:
students attending the Southern Indiana Technical and Career Center
the new student 4T (Trojans, Tigers, Titans and Toyota) program
the future of the student CEO, Creating Entrepreneurial Program
the strengthening partnership between EGSC and OCU (dual credit opportunities, tutoring for our elementary students, course offerings collaboration)

With this stated, the EGSC truly is the best place to be. From our hard-working and award-winning teachers and administrators to the curriculum which is offered is second to none Few school corporations our size can match the hard-working, passionate staff that defines the EGSC and the diversity of our programming and course offerings.

The EGSC has managed to find the necessary dollars to continue to offer this top notch programming. Not only are we proud of being able to do this, but this also allows for the success of our programs at our elementary schools, junior high school and high school. All of this enables the well-rounded student.

I encourage everyone to check out all that is going on by contacting our building principals, schedule a time to discuss the opportunities that our campuses have to offer or to simply visit our campuses.

div.div: 941 South Franklin St., Oakland City, IN 47660 | Phone 812-749-4755 | Fax 812-749-3343
